data.title: What Happened To Bill Duke? Everything To Know About His Health Condition
data.meta_description: In 1994, Bill Duke was diagnosed with prostate cancer which is very common in men. Bill has drastically changed his diet and he is a vegan. Bill Duke is completely fine and nothing is wrong with him.
data.text:
In 1994, Bill Duke was diagnosed with prostate cancer which is very common in men. Bill has drastically changed his diet and he is a vegan. Bill Duke is completely fine and nothing is wrong with him.

Bill Duke is a famous American actor and film director.

Table of Contents

What Happened To Bill Duke? Whatâs Wrong With Billâs Health?

Bill Duke is fine. There is no illness trouble him as we speak.

He had a few complications in the 1990s. Bill was diagnosed with prostate cancer (mostly in men) in 1994. But he fought a survived his life-threatening disease.

A doctor whose name is Mark Schultz had saved his life.

Furthermore, people were confused on the internet. There was a similar guy named Bill Duke who had a severe health issue. People were confused if it was actor Bill Duke.

Bill Duke (not the actor) was also diagnosed with cancer. He had ulcerative colitis, a type of colon cancer at age 40.

Health Update And Illness: Is Bill Okay?

Bill Duke is completely fine. He is healthy and okay.

But there was another problem that had troubled him severely. The food and diet Bill was consuming was not good.

Bill had digestive problems. His parents had a similar problem too. He had to take two laxatives every single day for more than two decades.

He developed a condition called plantar fasciitis which makes it very difficult to walk or stand. It makes your legs swollen, weak, irritated, and swollen.

And later, Bill finally changed his diet. He practiced veganism. Now he is completely healthy.

In social media and interviews, Bill promotes a healthy life. In one of his tweets, he wrote, âWe must remember we arenât staying clean to fight against one illness but ALL illnesses. It is important that we take care of ourselves in all aspects and stay aware.â

About Bill Duke Dukeâs Weight Loss Journey

Bill Duke never had a weight loss journey.

But due to aging, Duke has become quite slim.

He is 78 years old.

On Bill Dukeâs Family

Bill Duke was born to William Henry Duke Sr and Ethel Louise Duke.

He has a sibling brother.

And talking about his own family, Bill is married to Sheila Moses. Sheila and Bill have two children, William and Ethel.

Biography of Bill Duke

Bill Duke was born in Poughkeepsie, New York, United States.

He had attended Franklin D. Roosevelt High School. Duke later went to Dutchess Community College.

Duke has made appearances in movies like American Gigolo, Bird on a Wire, No Manâs Land, Exit Wounds, Menace II Society, Payback, X-Men: The Last Stand, and Mandy.
